title: Louise Haigh – 2021 Comments on Attempted Murder of Northern Ireland Police Officer
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Secretary of State for Northern Ireland, on 20 April 2021.
content:
This attempted murder of a serving police officer is utterly sickening.
